## Setup Workflow

### Phase 1: API Connection (5 minutes)

1. ‚úÖ Create Atlassian API token
   - Go to: https://id.atlassian.com/manage-profile/security/api-tokens
   - Create token labeled "USA250 Compass Integration"

2. ‚úÖ Find Compass Site ID
   - Visit your Compass dashboard
   - Extract from URL or component ARI

3. ‚úÖ Configure environment
   ```bash
   export COMPASS_API_TOKEN="your_token"
   export COMPASS_SITE_ID="your_site_id"
   ```

4. ‚úÖ Verify connection
   ```bash
   node scripts/check-compass-connection.js
   ```

**Expected**: Test 1 passes ‚úÖ

### Phase 2: Component Registration (15 minutes)

**Choose one method**:

**Option A: Compass UI (Recommended)**
- Manual creation via web interface
- Clear visual feedback
- Easier for first-time setup

**Option B: GraphQL API**
- Faster for bulk operations
- Requires familiarity with GraphQL
- Can be scripted

**Option C: Automated Sync (Future)**
- Reads TSDoc metadata
- One-command deployment
- Script pending implementation

### Phase 3: Integration (10 minutes)

1. ‚úÖ Link GitHub repository to each component
2. ‚úÖ Add Jira ticket references via custom fields
3. ‚úÖ Verify all tests pass
4. ‚úÖ (Optional) Enable GitHub Actions sync

---

After completing setup, all checks should pass:

node scripts/check-compass-connection.js

## Impact Analysis

### Before Compass Integration (Current State)

‚ùå No full-stack component visibility
‚ùå Manual Jira ticket ‚Üí code traceability
‚ùå No dependency graph visualization
‚ùå No component health metrics
‚ùå No automated change impact analysis

### After Compass Integration (Target State)

‚úÖ **Full-Stack Visibility**
- React components ‚Üí Backend services ‚Üí Infrastructure
- Real-time dependency graph
- Component ownership and on-call info

‚úÖ **Traceability**
- Jira ticket ‚Üí Compass component ‚Üí GitHub code
- One-click navigation from ticket to deployment
- Impact analysis for breaking changes

‚úÖ **Health Monitoring**
- Deployment frequency tracking
- Change failure rate metrics
- Mean time to restore (MTTR)
- Service level indicators (SLIs)

‚úÖ **Automation**
- Auto-sync on git push
- Dependency updates on merge
- Stale component detection
